search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Exercise.com (exercisecom.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Exercise.com is available at this URL: [https://www.exercise.com/pricing/](https://www.exercise.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Easily schedule appointments and classes, accept payments, send reminders, track visits, manage members and employees, manage multiple locations, and view business reports from your custom-branded fitness apps.

Brian Kula

Getting started is easy

We offer done-for-you migration from every software platform. We are fully HIPAA compliant and our payments infrastructure is PCI Level 1 compliant—your clients payment, package, and other data will all be imported. It’s simple, secure, and easy to start now.

Our team of experts will migrate your data!
